Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Racine
ShortDescription: EB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 83rd, Halsted and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 83rd, Halsted and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Racine.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
